## Source: ossf-package-analysis (877523dd053e13acd1b9e58650b8582eefdecf968a95e9997a115adbd7942683)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'lyft-sdk' @ 999.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
